io.github.flowersinthesand.portal

Class DefaultServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.flowersinthesand.portal.DefaultServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    public class DefaultServer
extends Object
implements Server
    Default implementation of Server.

    This implementation provides and manages Socket processing HTTP request and WebSocket following the portal protocol.

    As options, the following methods can be overridden.

    • parseURI(String)
    • parseEvent(String)
    • stringifyEvent(Map)
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

      Executes the given action retrieving all of the socket in this server.

      Executes the given action retrieving the socket of the given id.
      Server byTag(String[] names, Action<Socket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with all of the given names.
      Server byTag(String name, Action<Socket> action)
      Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given name.
      Action<ServerHttpExchange> httpAction()
      ServerHttpExchange action to install in wes

      Registers an action to be called when the socket has been opened.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultServer

        public DefaultServer()

    • Method Detail

      • parseURI

        protected Map<String,String> parseURI(String uri)
        Takes a portal URI and returns a map of parameters.

        This is a counterpart of urlBuilder of client option.

      • parseEvent

        protected Map<String,Object> parseEvent(String text)
        Takes a stringified event and returns an event object.

        A text in argument is generated by outbound of client option and this is akin to inbound of client option.

      • stringifyEvent

        protected String stringifyEvent(Map<String,Object> event)
        Takes an event object and returns a stringified event.

        This is akin to outbound of client option and a returned value will be handled by inbound of client option.

      • all

        public Server all(Action<Socket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Executes the given action retrieving all of the socket in this server.
        Specified by:
        all in interface Server

      • byId

        public Server byId(String id,
          Action<Socket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Executes the given action retrieving the socket of the given id. The given action will be executed only once if socket is found and won't be executed if not found.
        Specified by:
        byId in interface Server

      • byTag

        public Server byTag(String name,
           Action<Socket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with the given name. The given action will be executed multiple times if sockets are found and won't be executed if not found.
        Specified by:
        byTag in interface Server

      • byTag

        public Server byTag(String[] names,
           Action<Socket> action)
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Executes the given action retrieving the socket tagged with all of the given names. The given action will be executed multiple times if sockets are found and won't be executed if not found.
        Specified by:
        byTag in interface Server
